Profondo cordoglio per la scomparsa di Michela, barista di soli 49 anni
Ha combattuto fino all’ultimo con il sorriso sulle labbra.

06 Nov 2019, 16:37

Borgosesia piange la barista Michela, morta a soli 49 anni. Michela Vercelli ha combattuto fino all’ultimo, con il sorriso sulle labbra, contro la malattia che l’ha strappata all’amore della famiglia e all’affetto degli amici come riporta Notizia Oggi.
In tantissimi, sabato in chiesa parrocchiale, hanno voluto portare l’ultimo saluto a Michela, stringendosi al dolore del marito Alessio, dei genitori Elio e Anna, del fratello Paolo. Era molto conosciuta, per trent’anni ha servito al bancone del “Piccolo caffè”, nell’area pedonale di piazza Mazzini.

Deep condolences for the disappearance of Michela, a barista of only 49 years
He fought to the last with a smile on his face.

06 Nov 2019, 16:37

Borgosesia mourns the bartender Michela, who died at only 49 years of age. Michela Vercelli fought to the last, with a smile on her lips, against the illness that took her from the love of the family and the affection of her friends, as News Today reports.
In so many, on Saturday in the parish church, they wanted to bring the last farewell to Michela, embracing the pain of her husband Alessio, of his parents Elio and Anna, of his brother Paolo. She was well known, for thirty years she served at the counter of the "Piccolo caffè", in the pedestrian area of Piazza Mazzini.
